Description: This is a 1997 Epiphone Les Paul w/ Bigsby, Hardshell Case & Pro Setup!Have this guitar set up exactly the way you like for FREE! A used 1997 Korean-made Epiphone Les Paul w/ a bigsby. It sports a few signs of wear, but nothing major. This is a beautiful, rare guitar that plays as beautifully as it looks. Come visit Sky Guitars in Denton Texas! BUY IT RIGHT THE FIRST TIME! We inspect every single instrument when it first arrives! We inspect every aspect of the guitar including the neck, frets, fit and finish, as well as checking any electronics where applicable. We also do a complete setup. This includes setting the proper nut height, adjusting the neck, and checking the intonation of the guitar.Have it specifically adjusted for how you play! Do you use a capo? Are you a beginner? Do you prefer a certain type of string? Our Owner/Luthier will personally set up your guitar to fit your individual needs as a player! We will provide a receipt of purchase for your warranty and records. We guarantee that every guitar we sell has been kept in a humidified room. This guitar has a perfect neck and plays great. All instruments are professionally adjusted. NO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING AVAILABLE! PACKED AND READY TO SHIP SAFE AND SOUND! ABOUT US We have been a repair shop for 20 years and repair instruments for people all over the world! We have been a locally owned guitar shop in Denton, TX since 1994. We provide an incredible selection of musical instruments for both amateur and professional musicians. We stock both acoustic and electric guitars, electric and standup basses, mandolins, resonators, banjos, violins, violas, cellos, drums, pedals, effects, mics, stands, straps, amplifiers, PA gear and more. We are dedicated to competing with and beating the lowest internet prices on everything we carry in-store. We have long been the place musicians depend on for expert instrument set-up and repair. We started out as an instrument repair business in the early 90's and our business and clientele have grown year after year! We are both Denton, TX's Largest Music Store and Denton's Oldest and Best Musical Instrument Repair Shop. We've finally decided to start an online store to share our unbelievably affordable prices with those outside of Denton!
Title: 1997 Epiphone Les Paul with Bigsby, Hardshell Case & Pro Setup!
ConditionDescription: A used Korean-made 1997 Epiphone Les Paul w/ a bigsby. It sports a few signs of wear, but nothing major.
